attributes.additional_details: I would like it made illegal to ride a bicycle on pavements/footpaths all over the country, with a £30 fixed penalty fine for offenders.

rejection.details: It is already an offence to ride a bicycle on the pavement (s72 of the Highway Act 1835), for which the maximum penalty is considerably more than £30.  So there is no action for the Government to take to bring this measure in.
